Mega Miner NG is a multiplayer mining game featuring procedurally generated maps where players collaborate to mine resources, upgrade equipment, and build structures. The game includes inventory management, a shop system for upgrades, teleportation networks, and admin controls for host management. It supports both desktop and mobile controls with responsive UI, sound effects, and cloud save synchronization capabilities.
